extendedInfo.description: THANK YOU FOR YOUR FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT The Lottery Results app brings you the latest UK Lottery results to your mobile device. Featuring: â Updated draws direct to your handset â Prize Breakdown for every draw! â Automatic win checker in "my numbers" section â My Numbers - record the numbers you have played â Number Generator - can't decide what numbers to play? then have a lucky dip and allow the app to pick your numbers for you, NOW save them directly to "my numbers" in the latest version. â Lottery News - get the latest lottery news headlines, tips and success stories â Lottery Stats - find out the most played numbers This app is the all-in-one Application for any budding lottery fanatic. This application uses a Wi-Fi or Data network for certain areas of its content. Please make sure you have a stable Internet connection before launching this application. Please feel free to use our inbuilt feedback form to send us your comments, feedback and suggestions that you would like to see in future updates of this application Legal Disclaimer: All descriptions, names, characters, locations, imagery and videos in this application are copyright to their respective owners.Disclaimer:- - Always check your tickets with the official lottery service provider to confirm any possible winnings.

reviews.title: Got it working
reviews.comment: Great app but I get the blank screen issue that others have reported but can work around it by manually stopping the app in setting/apps and then starting the app.
reviews.author: Neil Owen

reviews.title: Gay
reviews.comment: This app only works 50/50, is it so hard to put a few numbers on? F-
reviews.author: Scott Allchurch

reviews.title: Good but keeps un installing itself.
reviews.comment: Up to date and accurate..but can you create a fix so it doesn\'t keep deleting itself please :)
reviews.author: Louise Bolton

reviews.title: Was great. What\'s changed?
reviews.comment: Great while it\'s there, but it keeps disappearing from my apps list. I have to search play store and re-install it every few days!
reviews.author: Wayne Stewart

reviews.title: Rubbish app
reviews.comment: This app needs to be fixed, does not always work, keeps freezing and will not open. I asked for this to be fixed dome 2 months back but nothing has been done.  I would use another app over this one!!
reviews.author: Daniel Leigh

reviews.title: A little winner
reviews.comment: Spot on. Can,t believe how good this app is compared to what i was using. Always wanted a number checker, just add your regular numbers on any of the games and it does the hard work for you, i like the way it highlights the numbers you may have matched which stops you going over each one 5 times before you finally accept you didn\'t win lol. Its got a euro raffle which saves me booting up my computer, to top it all its even got the prize breakdown. Love this handy little app THANKS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good but keep getting blank screen.
reviews.comment: This used to be a good, reliable app but since upgrade all I keep getting is a blank screen. Ive tried deleting and re installing , works for a while then same fault ago. You would think that with the millions of pounds players plough into the lotteries each week that they could get together and pay a professional to sort the errors in this app out by now.
reviews.author: Carol Packer

reviews.title: Was good but now bad.....
reviews.comment: Waste of time keeps uninstalling ............ fix it or lose it. It was good.
reviews.author: Stephan Bennett

reviews.title: Shame
reviews.comment: Used to be a good app, but every time i open it now there is just a blank screen staring back at me(on nexus 4). I don\'t want to have to uninstall then install every time i want to check my numbers
reviews.author: David Stone

reviews.title: Blank screen
reviews.comment: Terrible app. I get a blank screen all the time now despite uninstalling an reinstalling it. Will get rid.
reviews.author: Peyman Adjamian

reviews.title: Great app just keeps removing itself
reviews.comment: Great app just totally sick of it removing itself and having to reinstall
reviews.author: jen thorne

reviews.title: Robert
reviews.comment: Return of the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless since last update
reviews.comment: This app was superb, but since last update all I get is blank screens. Uninstalling and reinstalling solves the issue for first use, but from then on it\'s blank screens again. Waited a few weeks before reviewing hoping for resolution, but it didn\'t come :-(
reviews.author: Paul Anderson

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Will not work on HTC  with the new update...crap!!!!!
reviews.author: David Mitchell

reviews.title: Blank screen
reviews.comment: Was perfect before the update. Now I get a blank screen. I get it working by manually stopping and starting up the app again
reviews.author: Rog Dob

reviews.comment: Since last update won\'t load anything!! have reinstalled lots of times!! Was I 5star app
reviews.author: Zoe Tucker

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: Every time I install this, it seems to delete its self after being used. Fed up of downloading it
reviews.author: Owen Brazier

reviews.title: Ruined app
reviews.comment: What was a good app is now ruined after its \'\'upgrade\'\'. Only works occasionally. Tried removing and reinstalling. Still won\'t work. Pants.
reviews.author: Chris Woods

reviews.comment: Have to install every time I want to see numbers as they keep disappearing
reviews.author: Nerys Vaughan

reviews.comment: Good aps but un installing it self\'s
reviews.author: Ian Poole
